title: Scatter Plot with Masked Data using Matplotlib
description: This tutorial will guide you through creating a scatter plot with masked data points using the Python Matplotlib library. We will also add a line to demarcate the masked regions.

meta.title: Scatter Plot with Masked Data | Python Matplotlib Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to create a scatter plot with masked data points using Python Matplotlib library, including adding a line to demarcate the masked regions.
meta.keywords: Python, Matplotlib, Scatter Plot, Masked Data, Data Visualization
